topics.body:
I want to stick a hotdog on a metal pole.
Just that.

When people come by, they will notice it and wonder why there is a hotdog stuck on a metal pole. They'll go all curious or philosophical to the point that they start taking picture or Instagram it. They then add some ridiculous caption and stuff, and it circulates through Facebook and then Twitter, Tumblr and stuff.

And then a new meme is born.
